org.shared.net.filter.ssl

Interface SslEngineFactory<T extends SslEngineFactory<T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the parameterization lower bounded by SslEngineFactory itself.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SslFilterFactory

    public interface SslEngineFactory<T extends SslEngineFactory<T>>
    Defines a configurable factory for creating SSLEngines.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  SslEngineFactory.Mode
      An enumeration of SSLEngine operating modes.
